title: Decision Proposition Reference
description: A decision proposition reference is used to link an experience event that is a response to a particular proposition event.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Proposition Identifier
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: A unique identifier for the proposition event referenced by an "XDM ExperienceEvent". It is the expectation that applications use this "propositionID" in every experience event that was influenced by the set of propositions. An individual profile's proposition-response history is maintained with these proposition identifiers.
